name: G-8 Bridge to Dock 88
description: A strategic bridge within the G-8 Marine Base that connects to Dock 88. The bridge became a battlefield between the Straw Hats and Unit 55 before being destroyed by Luffy during the fight.

keyEvents.description: Battle erupts on the bridge between the Straw Hats and Hot-Blooded Special Forces Unit 55
keyEvents.significance: Major confrontation point in the Straw Hats' escape attempt

keyEvents.description: Luffy destroys the bridge during combat, sending everyone into the bay below
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the destructive power of Straw Hat battles and creates an unexpected obstacle

name: Dock 88
description: One of the docks within the G-8 Marine Base where the Going Merry is moored. It becomes the site of Vice Admiral Jonathan's ambush.

keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats arrive to find Drake's ambush waiting with overwhelming Marine forces
keyEvents.significance: Culmination of Jonathan's tactical planning and the most dangerous trap faced by the crew

keyEvents.description: Luffy is trapped in a Seastone net, becoming incapacitated
keyEvents.significance: Shows the Marines' strategic use of anti-Devil Fruit weapons

keyEvents.description: Nami and Chopper arrive with Dr. Kobato, bringing a rescue plan
keyEvents.significance: Setup for the crew's final escape attempt

name: G-8 Prison
description: The prison facility within the G-8 Marine Base where Zoro and Usopp were held captive.

keyEvents.description: Luffy and Sanji break in and free Zoro and Usopp
keyEvents.significance: Successful rescue mission reuniting the male Straw Hats

keyEvents.description: Shepherd left behind, still mistakenly called Condoriano by the guards
keyEvents.significance: Continuation of the beloved Condoriano running gag

name: G-8 Medical Center
description: The medical facility within G-8 Marine Base where Dr. Kobato works as a pediatrician.

keyEvents.description: Dr. Kobato decides to help Nami and Chopper reach their ship despite her fears
keyEvents.significance: Character defining moment showing moral growth transcending enemy lines

name: Vice Admiral Jonathan's Office
nameJapanese: ジョナサン中将のオフィス
description: The command office of Vice Admiral Jonathan, located atop the main mountain of the G-8 fortress with a balcony overlooking the base.

keyEvents.description: Luffy's group encounters Jonathan on his office balcony, with Luffy declaring his intention to escape
keyEvents.significance: Direct confrontation between the pirate captain and the Marine vice admiral
